metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2575 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors component in Oracle MySQL 5.1.34 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors related to Connector/J.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2575` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysql-java - 5.1.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-java package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.38-1').
